txt.en:
'All filled and ready for delivery. I would like to thank you for your assistance, [placeholder], as I would not have been able to see this last bit of harvest along without you.

'This cask is meant for another; however, I should like to see it sent along to my friend Bregedúr. It was he who sent it to me, after all... why should he not have the finest wine of the valley?

'If you would, take this back to him at Celondim. Follow the path to the east and turn towards the south-east across the bridge. You will find him at the crafters' market.'

'Thank you, [placeholder], and thank my friend Brethilwen for knowing my intentions. I understand that Brethilwen was beset by goblins and that you fought many off to obtain this spirit. Know that it was for a worthy cause.'
'Take the cask to Bregedúr at the crafters' market in Celondim, south of here.'
Brethilwen wishes to thank Bregedúr for his kindness.
Bregedúr spends his time at the crafters' market in Celondim.\n\nBrethilwen crushed the grapes you collected into a fine wine and sent them on to her friend Bregedúr in Celondim.
